3590        final float xf10000 = lerp(gradCoord6D(seed, x0, y1, z0, w0, u0, v0, xd0, yd1, zd0, wd0, ud0, vd0), gradCoord6D(seed, x1, y1, z0, w0, u0, v0, xd1, yd1, zd0, wd0, ud0, vd0), xs);
3591        final float xf01000 = lerp(gradCoord6D(seed, x0, y0, z1, w0, u0, v0, xd0, yd0, zd1, wd0, ud0, vd0), gradCoord6D(seed, x1, y0, z1, w0, u0, v0, xd1, yd0, zd1, wd0, ud0, vd0), xs);

3654        final float zf011 = lerp(yf0011, yf1011, zs);
3655        final float zf111 = lerp(yf0111, yf1111, zs);
3656
3657        final float wf00 = lerp(zf000, zf100, ws);
3658        final float wf10 = lerp(zf010, zf110, ws);
3659        final float wf01 = lerp(zf001, zf101, ws);
3660        final float wf11 = lerp(zf011, zf111, ws);
3661
3662        final float uf0 = lerp(wf00, wf10, us);
3663        final float uf1 = lerp(wf01, wf11, us);
3664
3665        return lerp(uf0, uf1, vs) * 1.61f;
3666    }
3667    private float singlePerlinFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
3668        int seed = this.seed;
3669        float sum = singlePerlin(seed, x, y, z, w, u, v);
3670        float amp = 1;
3671
3672        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3673            x *= lacunarity;
3674            y *= lacunarity;
3675            z *= lacunarity;
3676            w *= lacunarity;
3677            u *= lacunarity;
3678            v *= lacunarity;
3679
3680            amp *= gain;
3681            sum += singlePerlin(++seed, x, y, z, w, u, v) * amp;
3682        }
3683
3684        return sum * fractalBounding;
3685    }
3686
3687    private float singlePerlinFractalBillow(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
3688        int seed = this.seed;
3689        float sum = Math.abs(singlePerlin(seed, x, y, z, w, u, v)) * 2 - 1;
3690        float amp = 1;
3691
3692        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3693            if(fractalSpiral){
3694                final float x2 = rotateX6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3695                final float y2 = rotateY6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3696                final float z2 = rotateZ6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3697                final float w2 = rotateW6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3698                final float u2 = rotateU6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3699                final float v2 = rotateV6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3700                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2; w = w2; u = u2; v = v2;
3701            }
3702            x *= lacunarity;
3703            y *= lacunarity;
3704            z *= lacunarity;
3705            w *= lacunarity;
3706            u *= lacunarity;
3707            v *= lacunarity;
3708
3709            amp *= gain;
3710            sum += (Math.abs(singlePerlin(++seed, x, y, z, w, u, v)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
3711        }
3712
3713        return sum * fractalBounding;
3714    }
3715
3716    private float singlePerlinFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
3717        int seed = this.seed;
3718        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
3719        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
3720            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singlePerlin(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u, v));
3721            correction += (exp *= 0.5);
3722            sum += spike * exp;
3723            if(fractalSpiral){
3724                final float x2 = rotateX6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3725                final float y2 = rotateY6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3726                final float z2 = rotateZ6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3727                final float w2 = rotateW6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3728                final float u2 = rotateU6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3729                final float v2 = rotateV6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
3730                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2; w = w2; u = u2; v = v2;
3731            }
3732            x *= lacunarity;
3733            y *= lacunarity;
3734            z *= lacunarity;
3735            w *= lacunarity;
3736            u *= lacunarity;
3737            v *= lacunarity;
3738        }
3739        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
3740    }

3742    // Simplex Noise
3743    public float getSimplexFractal(float x, float y, float z) {
3744        x *= frequency;
3745        y *= frequency;
3746        z *= frequency;
3747
3748        switch (fractalType) {
3749            case FBM:
3750                return singleSimplexFractalFBM(x, y, z);
3751            case BILLOW:
3752                return singleSimplexFractalBillow(x, y, z);
3753            case RIDGED_MULTI:
3754                return singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(x, y, z);
3755            default:
3756                return 0;
3757        }
3758    }

3760    /**
3761     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity
3762     * (2) and gain (0.5) in 3D.
3763     * @param x
3764     * @param y
3765     * @param z
3766     * @param seed
3767     * @param octaves
3768     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
3769     */
3770    public float layered3D(float x, float y, float z, int seed, int octaves)
3771    {
3772        x *= 0.03125f;
3773        y *= 0.03125f;
3774        z *= 0.03125f;
3775
3776        float sum = 1 - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z));
3777        float amp = 1;
3778
3779        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3780            x *= 2f;
3781            y *= 2f;
3782            z *= 2f;
3783
3784            amp *= 0.5f;
3785            sum -= (1 - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z))) * amp;
3786        }
3787        amp = gain;
3788        float ampFractal = 1;
3789        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3790            ampFractal += amp;
3791            amp *= gain;
3792        }
3793        return sum / ampFractal;
3794    }

3799     * @param y
3800     * @param z

3802     * @param octaves
3803     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
3804     */

3808        y *= frequency;

3813
3814        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
3815            x *= 2f;
3816            y *= 2f;
3817            z *= 2f;
3818
3819            amp *= 0.5f;
3820            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z) * amp;
3821        }
3822        amp = gain;
3823        float ampFractal = 1;
3824        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {

3826            amp *= gain;
3827        }

3829    }

3975    /**
3976     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and specified lacunarity (the amount of
3977     * frequency change between octaves); gain is not used.
3978     * @param x
3979     * @param y
3980     * @param z
3981     * @param seed any int
3982     * @param octaves how many "layers of detail" to generate; at least 1, but note this slows down with many octaves
3983     * @param frequency often about {@code 1f / 32f}, but generally adjusted for the use case
3984     * @param lacunarity when {@code octaves} is 2 or more, this affects the change between layers
3985     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
3986     */
3987    public float ridged3D(float x, float y, float z, int seed, int octaves, float frequency, float lacunarity)
3988    {
3989        x *= frequency;
3990        y *= frequency;
3991        z *= frequency;
3992
3993        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
3994        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
3995            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z));
3996            correction += (exp *= 0.5);
3997            sum += spike * exp;
3998            if(fractalSpiral){
3999                final float x2 = rotateX3D(x, y, z);
4000                final float y2 = rotateY3D(x, y, z);
4001                final float z2 = rotateZ3D(x, y, z);
4002                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2;
4003            }
4004            x *= lacunarity;
4005            y *= lacunarity;
4006            z *= lacunarity;
4007        }
4008        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
4009    }

4014        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
4015            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z));
4016            correction += (exp *= 0.5);
4017            sum += spike * exp;
4018            if(fractalSpiral){
4019                final float x2 = rotateX3D(x, y, z);
4020                final float y2 = rotateY3D(x, y, z);
4021                final float z2 = rotateZ3D(x, y, z);
4022                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2;
4023            }

4030
4031    public float getSimplex(float x, float y, float z) {
4032        return singleSimplex(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency, z * frequency);
4033    }
4034
4035    public float singleSimplex(int seed, float x, float y, float z) {
4036        float t = (x + y + z) * F3f;
4037        int i = fastFloor(x + t);
4038        int j = fastFloor(y + t);
4039        int k = fastFloor(z + t);
4040
4041        t = (i + j + k) * G3f;
4042        float x0 = x - (i - t);
4043        float y0 = y - (j - t);
4044        float z0 = z - (k - t);
4045
4046        int i1, j1, k1;
4047        int i2, j2, k2;
4048
4049        if (x0 >= y0) {
4050            if (y0 >= z0) {
4051                i1 = 1;
4052                j1 = 0;
4053                k1 = 0;
4054                i2 = 1;
4055                j2 = 1;
4056                k2 = 0;
4057            } else if (x0 >= z0) {
4058                i1 = 1;
4059                j1 = 0;
4060                k1 = 0;
4061                i2 = 1;
4062                j2 = 0;
4063                k2 = 1;
4064            } else // x0 < z0
4065            {
4066                i1 = 0;
4067                j1 = 0;
4068                k1 = 1;
4069                i2 = 1;
4070                j2 = 0;
4071                k2 = 1;
4072            }
4073        } else // x0 < y0
4074        {
4075            if (y0 < z0) {
4076                i1 = 0;
4077                j1 = 0;
4078                k1 = 1;
4079                i2 = 0;
4080                j2 = 1;
4081                k2 = 1;
4082            } else if (x0 < z0) {
4083                i1 = 0;
4084                j1 = 1;
4085                k1 = 0;
4086                i2 = 0;
4087                j2 = 1;
4088                k2 = 1;
4089            } else // x0 >= z0
4090            {
4091                i1 = 0;
4092                j1 = 1;
4093                k1 = 0;
4094                i2 = 1;
4095                j2 = 1;
4096                k2 = 0;
4097            }
4098        }
4099
4100        float x1 = x0 - i1 + G3f;
4101        float y1 = y0 - j1 + G3f;
4102        float z1 = z0 - k1 + G3f;
4103        float x2 = x0 - i2 + F3f;
4104        float y2 = y0 - j2 + F3f;
4105        float z2 = z0 - k2 + F3f;
4106        float x3 = x0 - 0.5f;
4107        float y3 = y0 - 0.5f;
4108        float z3 = z0 - 0.5f;
4109
4110        float n = 0;
4111
4112        t = 0.6f - x0 * x0 - y0 * y0 - z0 * z0;
4113        if (t > 0) {
4114            t *= t;
4115            n += t * t * gradCoord3D(seed, i, j, k, x0, y0, z0);
4116        }
4117
4118        t = 0.6f - x1 * x1 - y1 * y1 - z1 * z1;
4119        if (t > 0) {
4120            t *= t;
4121            n += t * t * gradCoord3D(seed, i + i1, j + j1, k + k1, x1, y1, z1);
4122        }
4123
4124        t = 0.6f - x2 * x2 - y2 * y2 - z2 * z2;
4125        if (t > 0) {
4126            t *= t;
4127            n += t * t * gradCoord3D(seed, i + i2, j + j2, k + k2, x2, y2, z2);
4128        }
4129
4130        t = 0.6f - x3 * x3 - y3 * y3 - z3 * z3;
4131        if (t > 0)  {
4132            t *= t;
4133            n += t * t * gradCoord3D(seed, i + 1, j + 1, k + 1, x3, y3, z3);
4134        }
4135
4136        return 31.5f * n;
4137    }

4139    public float getSimplexFractal(float x, float y) {
4140        x *= frequency;
4141        y *= frequency;
4142
4143        switch (fractalType) {
4144            case FBM:
4145                return singleSimplexFractalFBM(x, y);
4146            case BILLOW:
4147                return singleSimplexFractalBillow(x, y);
4148            case RIDGED_MULTI:
4149                return singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(x, y);
4150            default:
4151                return 0;
4152        }
4153    }

4155    /**
4156     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity
4157     * (2) and gain (0.5) in 2D.
4158     * @param x
4159     * @param y
4160     * @param seed
4161     * @param octaves
4162     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
4163     */
4164    public float layered2D(float x, float y, int seed, int octaves)
4165    {
4166        x *= 0.03125f;
4167        y *= 0.03125f;
4168
4169        float sum = 1 - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed, x, y));
4170        float amp = 1;
4171
4172        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4173            x *= 2f;
4174            y *= 2f;
4175
4176            amp *= 0.5f;
4177            sum -= (1 - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y))) * amp;
4178        }
4179        amp = gain;
4180        float ampFractal = 1;
4181        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4182            ampFractal += amp;
4183            amp *= gain;
4184        }
4185        return sum / ampFractal;
4186    }

4261    public float layered2D(float x, float y, int seed, int octaves, float frequency, float lacunarity, float gain)

4269        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {

4272
4273            amp *= gain;
4274            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y) * amp;
4275        }
4276        amp = gain;
4277        float ampFractal = 1;
4278        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4279            ampFractal += amp;
4280            amp *= gain;
4281        }
4282        return sum / ampFractal;
4283    }
4284
4285    private float singleSimplexFractalFBM(float x, float y) {
4286        int seed = this.seed;
4287        float sum = singleSimplex(seed, x, y);
4288        float amp = 1;
4289
4290        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4291            x *= lacunarity;
4292            y *= lacunarity;
4293
4294            amp *= gain;
4295            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y) * amp;
4296        }
4297
4298        return sum * fractalBounding;
4299    }
4300
4301    private float singleSimplexFractalBillow(float x, float y) {
4302        int seed = this.seed;
4303        float sum = Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed, x, y)) * 2 - 1;
4304        float amp = 1;
4305
4306        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4307            if(fractalSpiral){
4308                final float x2 = rotateX2D(x, y);
4309                final float y2 = rotateY2D(x, y);
4310                x = x2; y = y2;
4311            }
4312            x *= lacunarity;
4313            y *= lacunarity;
4314            amp *= gain;
4315            sum += (Math.abs(singleSimplex(++seed, x, y)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
4316        }
4317
4318        return sum * fractalBounding;
4319    }

4321    /**
4322     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity
4323     * (2) and gain (0.5).
4324     * @param x
4325     * @param y
4326     * @param seed
4327     * @param octaves
4328     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
4329     */
4330    public float ridged2D(float x, float y, int seed, int octaves)
4331    {
4332        return ridged2D(x, y, seed, octaves, 0.03125f, 2f);
4333    }
4334    /**
4335     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and default frequency (0.03125), lacunarity
4336     * (2) and gain (0.5).
4337     * @param x
4338     * @param y
4339     * @param seed
4340     * @param octaves
4341     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
4342     */
4343    public float ridged2D(float x, float y, int seed, int octaves, float frequency)
4344    {
4345        return ridged2D(x, y, seed, octaves, frequency, 2f);
4346    }
4347    /**
4348     * Generates ridged-multi simplex noise with the given amount of octaves and specified lacunarity (the amount of
4349     * frequency change between octaves); gain is not used.
4350     * @param x
4351     * @param y
4352     * @param seed any int
4353     * @param octaves how many "layers of detail" to generate; at least 1, but note this slows down with many octaves
4354     * @param frequency often about {@code 1f / 32f}, but generally adjusted for the use case
4355     * @param lacunarity when {@code octaves} is 2 or more, this affects the change between layers
4356     * @return noise as a float between -1f and 1f
4357     */
4358    public float ridged2D(float x, float y, int seed, int octaves, float frequency, float lacunarity)
4359    {
4360        x *= frequency;
4361        y *= frequency;
4362
4363        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
4364        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
4365            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y));
4366            correction += (exp *= 0.5);
4367            sum += spike * exp;
4368            if(fractalSpiral){
4369                final float x2 = rotateX2D(x, y);
4370                final float y2 = rotateY2D(x, y);
4371                x = x2; y = y2;
4372            }
4373            x *= lacunarity;
4374            y *= lacunarity;
4375        }
4376        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
4377    }
4378
4379    private float singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y) {
4380        int seed = this.seed;
4381        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
4382        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
4383            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y));
4384            correction += (exp *= 0.5);
4385            sum += spike * exp;
4386            if(fractalSpiral){
4387                final float x2 = rotateX2D(x, y);
4388                final float y2 = rotateY2D(x, y);
4389                x = x2; y = y2;
4390            }
4391            x *= lacunarity;
4392            y *= lacunarity;
4393        }
4394        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
4395    }
4396
4397    public float getSimplex(float x, float y) {
4398        return singleSimplex(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency);
4399    }
4400
4401    public float singleSimplex(int seed, float x, float y) {
4402        float t = (x + y) * F2f;
4403        int i = fastFloor(x + t);
4404        int j = fastFloor(y + t);
4405
4406        t = (i + j) * G2f;
4407        float X0 = i - t;
4408        float Y0 = j - t;
4409
4410        float x0 = x - X0;
4411        float y0 = y - Y0;
4412
4413        int i1, j1;
4414        if (x0 > y0) {
4415            i1 = 1;
4416            j1 = 0;
4417        } else {
4418            i1 = 0;
4419            j1 = 1;
4420        }
4421
4422        float x1 = x0 - i1 + G2f;
4423        float y1 = y0 - j1 + G2f;
4424        float x2 = x0 - 1 + H2f;
4425        float y2 = y0 - 1 + H2f;
4426
4427        float n = 0f;
4428
4429        t = 0.75f - x0 * x0 - y0 * y0;
4430        if (t >= 0) {
4431            t *= t;
4432            n += t * t * gradCoord2D(seed, i, j, x0, y0);
4433        }
4434
4435        t = 0.75f - x1 * x1 - y1 * y1;
4436        if (t > 0) {
4437            t *= t;
4438            n += t * t * gradCoord2D(seed, i + i1, j + j1, x1, y1);
4439        }
4440
4441        t = 0.75f - x2 * x2 - y2 * y2;
4442        if (t > 0)  {
4443            t *= t;
4444            n += t * t * gradCoord2D(seed, i + 1, j + 1, x2, y2);
4445        }
4446
4447        return 9.11f * n;
4448    }
4449
4450    public float getSimplex(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4451        return singleSimplex(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency, z * frequency, w * frequency);
4452    }
4453
4454    public float singleSimplex(int seed, float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4455        float n = 0f;
4456        float t = (x + y + z + w) * F4f;
4457        int i = fastFloor(x + t);
4458        int j = fastFloor(y + t);
4459        int k = fastFloor(z + t);
4460        int l = fastFloor(w + t);
4461        t = (i + j + k + l) * G4f;
4462        final float X0 = i - t;
4463        final float Y0 = j - t;
4464        final float Z0 = k - t;
4465        final float W0 = l - t;
4466        final float x0 = x - X0;
4467        final float y0 = y - Y0;
4468        final float z0 = z - Z0;
4469        final float w0 = w - W0;
4470
4471        final int[] SIMPLEX_4D = FastNoise.SIMPLEX_4D;
4472        final int c = (x0 > y0 ? 128 : 0) | (x0 > z0 ? 64 : 0) | (y0 > z0 ? 32 : 0) | (x0 > w0 ? 16 : 0) | (y0 > w0 ? 8 : 0) | (z0 > w0 ? 4 : 0);
4473        final int ip = SIMPLEX_4D[c];
4474        final int jp = SIMPLEX_4D[c + 1];
4475        final int kp = SIMPLEX_4D[c + 2];
4476        final int lp = SIMPLEX_4D[c + 3];
4477
4478        final int i1 = ip >> 2;
4479        final int i2 = ip >> 1 & 1;
4480        final int i3 = ip & 1;
4481        final int j1 = jp >> 2;
4482        final int j2 = jp >> 1 & 1;
4483        final int j3 = jp & 1;
4484        final int k1 = kp >> 2;
4485        final int k2 = kp >> 1 & 1;
4486        final int k3 = kp & 1;
4487        final int l1 = lp >> 2;
4488        final int l2 = lp >> 1 & 1;
4489        final int l3 = lp & 1;
4490
4491        final float x1 = x0 - i1 + G4f;
4492        final float y1 = y0 - j1 + G4f;
4493        final float z1 = z0 - k1 + G4f;
4494        final float w1 = w0 - l1 + G4f;
4495        final float x2 = x0 - i2 + 2 * G4f;
4496        final float y2 = y0 - j2 + 2 * G4f;
4497        final float z2 = z0 - k2 + 2 * G4f;
4498        final float w2 = w0 - l2 + 2 * G4f;
4499        final float x3 = x0 - i3 + 3 * G4f;
4500        final float y3 = y0 - j3 + 3 * G4f;
4501        final float z3 = z0 - k3 + 3 * G4f;
4502        final float w3 = w0 - l3 + 3 * G4f;
4503        final float x4 = x0 - 1 + 4 * G4f;
4504        final float y4 = y0 - 1 + 4 * G4f;
4505        final float z4 = z0 - 1 + 4 * G4f;
4506        final float w4 = w0 - 1 + 4 * G4f;
4507
4508        t = 0.75f - x0 * x0 - y0 * y0 - z0 * z0 - w0 * w0;
4509        if (t > 0) {
4510            t *= t;
4511            n = t * t * gradCoord4D(seed, i, j, k, l, x0, y0, z0, w0);
4512        }
4513        t = 0.75f - x1 * x1 - y1 * y1 - z1 * z1 - w1 * w1;
4514        if (t > 0) {
4515            t *= t;
4516            n += t * t * gradCoord4D(seed, i + i1, j + j1, k + k1, l + l1, x1, y1, z1, w1);
4517        }
4518        t = 0.75f - x2 * x2 - y2 * y2 - z2 * z2 - w2 * w2;
4519        if (t > 0) {
4520            t *= t;
4521            n += t * t * gradCoord4D(seed, i + i2, j + j2, k + k2, l + l2, x2, y2, z2, w2);
4522        }
4523        t = 0.75f - x3 * x3 - y3 * y3 - z3 * z3 - w3 * w3;
4524        if (t > 0) {
4525            t *= t;
4526            n += t * t * gradCoord4D(seed, i + i3, j + j3, k + k3, l + l3, x3, y3, z3, w3);
4527        }
4528        t = 0.75f - x4 * x4 - y4 * y4 - z4 * z4 - w4 * w4;
4529        if (t > 0) {
4530            t *= t;
4531            n += t * t * gradCoord4D(seed, i + 1, j + 1, k + 1, l + 1, x4, y4, z4, w4);
4532        }
4533
4534        return 4.9f * n;
4535    }

4537    // Simplex Noise
4538    public float getSimplexFractal(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4539        x *= frequency;
4540        y *= frequency;
4541        z *= frequency;
4542        w *= frequency;
4543
4544        switch (fractalType) {
4545            case FBM:
4546                return singleSimplexFractalFBM(x, y, z, w);
4547            case BILLOW:
4548                return singleSimplexFractalBillow(x, y, z, w);
4549            case RIDGED_MULTI:
4550                return singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(x, y, z, w);
4551            default:
4552                return 0;
4553        }
4554    }
4555
4556    private float singleSimplexFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4557        int seed = this.seed;
4558        float sum = singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z, w);
4559        float amp = 1;
4560
4561        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4562            x *= lacunarity;
4563            y *= lacunarity;
4564            z *= lacunarity;
4565            w *= lacunarity;
4566
4567            amp *= gain;
4568            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w) * amp;
4569        }
4570
4571        return sum * fractalBounding;
4572    }
4573
4574    private float singleSimplexFractalBillow(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4575        int seed = this.seed;
4576        float sum = Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z, w)) * 2 - 1;
4577        float amp = 1;
4578
4579        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4580            if(fractalSpiral){
4581                final float x2 = rotateX4D(x, y, z, w);
4582                final float y2 = rotateY4D(x, y, z, w);
4583                final float z2 = rotateZ4D(x, y, z, w);
4584                final float w2 = rotateW4D(x, y, z, w);
4585                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2; w = w2;
4586            }
4587            x *= lacunarity;
4588            y *= lacunarity;
4589            z *= lacunarity;
4590            w *= lacunarity;
4591
4592            amp *= gain;
4593            sum += (Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
4594        }
4595
4596        return sum * fractalBounding;
4597    }
4598    private float singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z, float w) {
4599        int seed = this.seed;
4600        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
4601        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
4602            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w));
4603            correction += (exp *= 0.5);
4604            sum += spike * exp;
4605            if(fractalSpiral){
4606                final float x2 = rotateX4D(x, y, z, w);
4607                final float y2 = rotateY4D(x, y, z, w);
4608                final float z2 = rotateZ4D(x, y, z, w);
4609                final float w2 = rotateW4D(x, y, z, w);
4610                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2; w = w2;
4611            }
4612            x *= lacunarity;
4613            y *= lacunarity;
4614            z *= lacunarity;
4615            w *= lacunarity;
4616        }
4617        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
4618    }
4619
4620    // 5D Simplex
4621
4622    private static final float
4623            F5 = (float) ((Math.sqrt(6.0) - 1.0) / 5.0),
4624            G5 = (float) ((6.0 - Math.sqrt(6.0)) / 30.0),
4625            LIMIT5 = 0.7f;
4626
4627    public float singleSimplex(int seed, float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4628        float n0, n1, n2, n3, n4, n5;
4629        float t = (x + y + z + w + u) * F5;
4630        int i = fastFloor(x + t);
4631        int j = fastFloor(y + t);
4632        int k = fastFloor(z + t);
4633        int l = fastFloor(w + t);
4634        int h = fastFloor(u + t);
4635        t = (i + j + k + l + h) * G5;
4636        float X0 = i - t;
4637        float Y0 = j - t;
4638        float Z0 = k - t;
4639        float W0 = l - t;
4640        float U0 = h - t;
4641        float x0 = x - X0;
4642        float y0 = y - Y0;
4643        float z0 = z - Z0;
4644        float w0 = w - W0;
4645        float u0 = u - U0;
4646
4647        int rankx = 0;
4648        int ranky = 0;
4649        int rankz = 0;
4650        int rankw = 0;
4651        int ranku = 0;
4652
4653        if (x0 > y0) rankx++; else ranky++;
4654        if (x0 > z0) rankx++; else rankz++;
4655        if (x0 > w0) rankx++; else rankw++;
4656        if (x0 > u0) rankx++; else ranku++;
4657
4658        if (y0 > z0) ranky++; else rankz++;
4659        if (y0 > w0) ranky++; else rankw++;
4660        if (y0 > u0) ranky++; else ranku++;
4661
4662        if (z0 > w0) rankz++; else rankw++;
4663        if (z0 > u0) rankz++; else ranku++;
4664
4665        if (w0 > u0) rankw++; else ranku++;
4666
4667        int i1 = 3 - rankx >>> 31;
4668        int j1 = 3 - ranky >>> 31;
4669        int k1 = 3 - rankz >>> 31;
4670        int l1 = 3 - rankw >>> 31;
4671        int h1 = 3 - ranku >>> 31;
4672
4673        int i2 = 2 - rankx >>> 31;
4674        int j2 = 2 - ranky >>> 31;
4675        int k2 = 2 - rankz >>> 31;
4676        int l2 = 2 - rankw >>> 31;
4677        int h2 = 2 - ranku >>> 31;
4678
4679        int i3 = 1 - rankx >>> 31;
4680        int j3 = 1 - ranky >>> 31;
4681        int k3 = 1 - rankz >>> 31;
4682        int l3 = 1 - rankw >>> 31;
4683        int h3 = 1 - ranku >>> 31;
4684
4685        int i4 = -rankx >>> 31;
4686        int j4 = -ranky >>> 31;
4687        int k4 = -rankz >>> 31;
4688        int l4 = -rankw >>> 31;
4689        int h4 = -ranku >>> 31;
4690
4691        float x1 = x0 - i1 + G5;
4692        float y1 = y0 - j1 + G5;
4693        float z1 = z0 - k1 + G5;
4694        float w1 = w0 - l1 + G5;
4695        float u1 = u0 - h1 + G5;
4696
4697        float x2 = x0 - i2 + 2 * G5;
4698        float y2 = y0 - j2 + 2 * G5;
4699        float z2 = z0 - k2 + 2 * G5;
4700        float w2 = w0 - l2 + 2 * G5;
4701        float u2 = u0 - h2 + 2 * G5;
4702
4703        float x3 = x0 - i3 + 3 * G5;
4704        float y3 = y0 - j3 + 3 * G5;
4705        float z3 = z0 - k3 + 3 * G5;
4706        float w3 = w0 - l3 + 3 * G5;
4707        float u3 = u0 - h3 + 3 * G5;
4708
4709        float x4 = x0 - i4 + 4 * G5;
4710        float y4 = y0 - j4 + 4 * G5;
4711        float z4 = z0 - k4 + 4 * G5;
4712        float w4 = w0 - l4 + 4 * G5;
4713        float u4 = u0 - h4 + 4 * G5;
4714
4715        float x5 = x0 - 1 + 5 * G5;
4716        float y5 = y0 - 1 + 5 * G5;
4717        float z5 = z0 - 1 + 5 * G5;
4718        float w5 = w0 - 1 + 5 * G5;
4719        float u5 = u0 - 1 + 5 * G5;
4720
4721        t = LIMIT5 - x0 * x0 - y0 * y0 - z0 * z0 - w0 * w0 - u0 * u0;
4722        if (t < 0) n0 = 0;
4723        else
4724        {
4725            t *= t;
4726            n0 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i, j, k, l, h, x0, y0, z0, w0, u0);
4727        }
4728
4729        t = LIMIT5 - x1 * x1 - y1 * y1 - z1 * z1 - w1 * w1 - u1 * u1;
4730        if (t < 0) n1 = 0;
4731        else
4732        {
4733            t *= t;
4734            n1 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i + i1, j + j1, k + k1, l + l1, h + h1, x1, y1, z1, w1, u1);
4735        }
4736
4737        t = LIMIT5 - x2 * x2 - y2 * y2 - z2 * z2 - w2 * w2 - u2 * u2;
4738        if (t < 0) n2 = 0;
4739        else
4740        {
4741            t *= t;
4742            n2 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i + i2, j + j2, k + k2, l + l2, h + h2, x2, y2, z2, w2, u2);
4743        }
4744
4745        t = LIMIT5 - x3 * x3 - y3 * y3 - z3 * z3 - w3 * w3 - u3 * u3;
4746        if (t < 0) n3 = 0;
4747        else
4748        {
4749            t *= t;
4750            n3 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i + i3, j + j3, k + k3, l + l3, h + h3, x3, y3, z3, w3, u3);
4751        }
4752
4753        t = LIMIT5 - x4 * x4 - y4 * y4 - z4 * z4 - w4 * w4 - u4 * u4;
4754        if (t < 0) n4 = 0;
4755        else
4756        {
4757            t *= t;
4758            n4 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i + i4, j + j4, k + k4, l + l4, h + h4, x4, y4, z4, w4, u4);
4759        }
4760
4761        t = LIMIT5 - x5 * x5 - y5 * y5 - z5 * z5 - w5 * w5 - u5 * u5;
4762        if (t < 0) n5 = 0;
4763        else
4764        {
4765            t *= t;
4766            n5 = t * t * gradCoord5D(seed, i + 1, j + 1, k + 1, l + 1, h + 1, x5, y5, z5, w5, u5);
4767        }
4768
4769        return  (n0 + n1 + n2 + n3 + n4 + n5) * 10f; 
4770    }
4771
4772    public float getSimplex(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4773        return singleSimplex(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency, z * frequency, w * frequency, u * frequency);
4774    }

4778        y *= frequency;
4779        z *= frequency;
4780        w *= frequency;
4781        u *= frequency;
4782
4783        switch (fractalType) {
4784            case FBM:
4785                return singleSimplexFractalFBM(x, y, z, w, u);
4786            case BILLOW:
4787                return singleSimplexFractalBillow(x, y, z, w, u);
4788            case RIDGED_MULTI:
4789                return singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(x, y, z, w, u);
4790            default:
4791                return 0;
4792        }
4793    }

4795    private float singleSimplexFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4796        int seed = this.seed;
4797        float sum = singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z, w, u);
4798        float amp = 1;
4799
4800        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4801            x *= lacunarity;
4802            y *= lacunarity;
4803            z *= lacunarity;
4804            w *= lacunarity;
4805            u *= lacunarity;
4806
4807            amp *= gain;
4808            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u) * amp;
4809        }
4810
4811        return sum * fractalBounding;
4812    }
4813
4814    private float singleSimplexFractalBillow(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4815        int seed = this.seed;
4816        float sum = Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z, w, u)) * 2 - 1;
4817        float amp = 1;
4818
4819        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4820            if(fractalSpiral){
4821                final float x2 = rotateX5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4822                final float y2 = rotateY5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4823                final float z2 = rotateZ5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4824                final float w2 = rotateW5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4825                final float u2 = rotateU5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4826                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2; w = w2; u = u2;
4827            }
4828            x *= lacunarity;
4829            y *= lacunarity;
4830            z *= lacunarity;
4831            w *= lacunarity;
4832            u *= lacunarity;
4833
4834            amp *= gain;
4835            sum += (Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
4836        }
4837
4838        return sum * fractalBounding;
4839    }
4840
4841    private float singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u) {
4842        int seed = this.seed;
4843        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
4844        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
4845            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u));
4846            correction += (exp *= 0.5);
4847            sum += spike * exp;
4848            if(fractalSpiral){
4849                final float x2 = rotateX5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4850                final float y2 = rotateY5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4851                final float z2 = rotateZ5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4852                final float w2 = rotateW5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4853                final float u2 = rotateU5D(x, y, z, w, u);
4854                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2; w = w2; u = u2;
4855            }
4856            x *= lacunarity;
4857            y *= lacunarity;
4858            z *= lacunarity;
4859            w *= lacunarity;
4860            u *= lacunarity;
4861        }
4862        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
4863    }
4864
4865    // 6D Simplex
4866
4867    private final transient float[] m = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0}, cellDist = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0};
4868    private final transient int[] distOrder = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0}, intLoc = {0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0};
4869
4870    private static final float
4871            F6 = (float) ((Math.sqrt(7.0) - 1.0) / 6.0),
4872            G6 = F6 / (1f + 6f * F6),
4873            LIMIT6 = 0.8375f;
4874
4875
4876    public float singleSimplex(int seed, float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
4877        final float s = (x + y + z + w + u + v) * F6;
4878
4879        final int skewX = fastFloor(x + s), skewY = fastFloor(y + s), skewZ = fastFloor(z + s),
4880                skewW = fastFloor(w + s), skewU = fastFloor(u + s), skewV = fastFloor(v + s);
4881        intLoc[0] = skewX;
4882        intLoc[1] = skewY;
4883        intLoc[2] = skewZ;
4884        intLoc[3] = skewW;
4885        intLoc[4] = skewU;
4886        intLoc[5] = skewV;
4887
4888        final float unskew = (skewX + skewY + skewZ + skewW + skewU + skewV) * G6;
4889        cellDist[0] = x - skewX + unskew;
4890        cellDist[1] = y - skewY + unskew;
4891        cellDist[2] = z - skewZ + unskew;
4892        cellDist[3] = w - skewW + unskew;
4893        cellDist[4] = u - skewU + unskew;
4894        cellDist[5] = v - skewV + unskew;
4895
4896        int o0 = (cellDist[0]<cellDist[1]?1:0)+(cellDist[0]<cellDist[2]?1:0)+(cellDist[0]<cellDist[3]?1:0)+(cellDist[0]<cellDist[4]?1:0)+(cellDist[0]<cellDist[5]?1:0);
4897        int o1 = (cellDist[1]<=cellDist[0]?1:0)+(cellDist[1]<cellDist[2]?1:0)+(cellDist[1]<cellDist[3]?1:0)+(cellDist[1]<cellDist[4]?1:0)+(cellDist[1]<cellDist[5]?1:0);
4898        int o2 = (cellDist[2]<=cellDist[0]?1:0)+(cellDist[2]<=cellDist[1]?1:0)+(cellDist[2]<cellDist[3]?1:0)+(cellDist[2]<cellDist[4]?1:0)+(cellDist[2]<cellDist[5]?1:0);
4899        int o3 = (cellDist[3]<=cellDist[0]?1:0)+(cellDist[3]<=cellDist[1]?1:0)+(cellDist[3]<=cellDist[2]?1:0)+(cellDist[3]<cellDist[4]?1:0)+(cellDist[3]<cellDist[5]?1:0);
4900        int o4 = (cellDist[4]<=cellDist[0]?1:0)+(cellDist[4]<=cellDist[1]?1:0)+(cellDist[4]<=cellDist[2]?1:0)+(cellDist[4]<=cellDist[3]?1:0)+(cellDist[4]<cellDist[5]?1:0);
4901        int o5 = 15-(o0+o1+o2+o3+o4);
4902
4903        distOrder[o0]=0;
4904        distOrder[o1]=1;
4905        distOrder[o2]=2;
4906        distOrder[o3]=3;
4907        distOrder[o4]=4;
4908        distOrder[o5]=5;
4909
4910        float n = 0;
4911        float skewOffset = 0;
4912
4913        for (int c = -1; c < 6; c++) {
4914            if (c != -1) intLoc[distOrder[c]]++;
4915
4916            m[0] = cellDist[0] - (intLoc[0] - skewX) + skewOffset;
4917            m[1] = cellDist[1] - (intLoc[1] - skewY) + skewOffset;
4918            m[2] = cellDist[2] - (intLoc[2] - skewZ) + skewOffset;
4919            m[3] = cellDist[3] - (intLoc[3] - skewW) + skewOffset;
4920            m[4] = cellDist[4] - (intLoc[4] - skewU) + skewOffset;
4921            m[5] = cellDist[5] - (intLoc[5] - skewV) + skewOffset;
4922
4923            float tc = LIMIT6;
4924
4925            for (int d = 0; d < 6; d++) {
4926                tc -= m[d] * m[d];
4927            }
4928
4929            if (tc > 0) { 
4930                tc *= tc;
4931                n += gradCoord6D(seed, intLoc[0], intLoc[1], intLoc[2], intLoc[3], intLoc[4], intLoc[5],
4932                        m[0], m[1], m[2], m[3], m[4], m[5]) * tc * tc;
4933            }
4934            skewOffset += G6;
4935        }
4936        return 7.5f * n;
4937
4938    }
4939
4940    public float getSimplex(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
4941        return singleSimplex(seed, x * frequency, y * frequency, z * frequency, w * frequency, u * frequency, v * frequency);
4942    }
4943    // Simplex Noise
4944    public float getSimplexFractal(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
4945        x *= frequency;
4946        y *= frequency;
4947        z *= frequency;
4948        w *= frequency;
4949        u *= frequency;
4950        v *= frequency;
4951
4952        switch (fractalType) {
4953            case FBM:
4954                return singleSimplexFractalFBM(x, y, z, w, u, v);
4955            case BILLOW:
4956                return singleSimplexFractalBillow(x, y, z, w, u, v);
4957            case RIDGED_MULTI:
4958                return singleSimplexFractalRidgedMulti(x, y, z, w, u, v);
4959            default:
4960                return 0;
4961        }
4962    }

4964    private float singleSimplexFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z, float w, float u, float v) {
4965        int seed = this.seed;
4966        float sum = singleSimplex(seed, x, y, z, w, u, v);
4967        float amp = 1;
4968
4969        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4970            x *= lacunarity;
4971            y *= lacunarity;
4972            z *= lacunarity;
4973            w *= lacunarity;
4974            u *= lacunarity;
4975            v *= lacunarity;
4976
4977            amp *= gain;
4978            sum += singleSimplex(seed + i, x, y, z, w, u, v) * amp;
4979        }
4980
4981        return sum * fractalBounding;
4982    }

4987        float amp = 1;
4988
4989        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
4990            if(fractalSpiral){
4991                final float x2 = rotateX6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
4992                final float y2 = rotateY6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);

4995                final float u2 = rotateU6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
4996                final float v2 = rotateV6D(x, y, z, w, u, v);
4997                x = x2; y = y2; z = z2; w = w2; u = u2; v = v2;
4998            }
4999            x *= lacunarity;
5000            y *= lacunarity;
5001            z *= lacunarity;
5002            w *= lacunarity;
5003            u *= lacunarity;
5004            v *= lacunarity;
5005
5006            amp *= gain;

5008        }
5009
5010        return sum * fractalBounding;
5011    }

5123    private final static float CUBIC_3D_BOUNDING = 1 / (float) (1.5 * 1.5 * 1.5);
5124
5125    private float singleCubic(int seed, float x, float y, float z) {
5126        int x1 = fastFloor(x);
5127        int y1 = fastFloor(y);
5128        int z1 = fastFloor(z);
5129
5130        int x0 = x1 - 1;
5131        int y0 = y1 - 1;
5132        int z0 = z1 - 1;
5133        int x2 = x1 + 1;
5134        int y2 = y1 + 1;
5135        int z2 = z1 + 1;
5136        int x3 = x1 + 2;
5137        int y3 = y1 + 2;
5138        int z3 = z1 + 2;
5139
5140        float xs = x - (float) x1;
5141        float ys = y - (float) y1;
5142        float zs = z - (float) z1;
5143
5144        return cubicLerp(
5145                cubicLerp(
5146                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y0, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y0, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y0, z0), xs),
5147                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y1, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y1, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y1, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y1, z0), xs),
5148                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y2, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y2, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y2, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y2, z0), xs),
5149                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y3, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y3, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y3, z0), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y3, z0), xs),
5150                        ys),
5151                cubicLerp(
5152                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y0, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y0, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y0, z1), xs),
5153                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y1, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y1, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y1, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y1, z1), xs),
5154                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y2, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y2, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y2, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y2, z1), xs),
5155                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y3, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y3, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y3, z1), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y3, z1), xs),
5156                        ys),
5157                cubicLerp(
5158                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y0, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y0, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y0, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y0, z2), xs),
5159                        cubicLerp(valCoord3D(seed, x0, y1, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x1, y1, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x2, y1, z2), valCoord3D(seed, x3, y1, z2), xs),

5162                        ys),
5163                cubicLerp(

5258

5273                        xs),
5274                cubicLerp(valCoord2D(seed, x0, y2), valCoord2D(seed, x1, y2), valCoord2D(seed, x2, y2), valCoord2D(seed, x3, y2),
5275                        xs),

5281    // Cellular Noise
5282    public float getCellular(float x, float y, float z) {
5283        x *= frequency;
5284        y *= frequency;
5285        z *= frequency;
5286
5287        switch (cellularReturnType) {
5288            case CELL_VALUE:
5289            case NOISE_LOOKUP:
5290            case DISTANCE:
5291                return singleCellular(x, y, z);
5292            default:
5293                return singleCellular2Edge(x, y, z);
5294        }

5297    private float singleCellular(float x, float y, float z) {
5298        int xr = fastRound(x);
5299        int yr = fastRound(y);
5300        int zr = fastRound(z);
5301
5302        float distance = 999999;
5303        int xc = 0, yc = 0, zc = 0;
5304
5305        switch (cellularDistanceFunction) {
5306            case EUCLIDEAN:
5307                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5308                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5309                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5310                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5311

5313                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;

5315
5316                            float newDistance = vecX * vecX + vecY * vecY + vecZ * vecZ;
5317

5319                                distance = newDistance;
5320                                xc = xi;
5321                                yc = yi;
5322                                zc = zi;
5323                            }
5324                        }
5325                    }
5326                }
5327                break;

5331                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {

5333

5335                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5336                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5337
5338                            float newDistance = Math.abs(vecX) + Math.abs(vecY) + Math.abs(vecZ);
5339
5340                            if (newDistance < distance) {
5341                                distance = newDistance;
5342                                xc = xi;
5343                                yc = yi;

5345                            }
5346                        }
5347                    }
5348                }
5349                break;
5350            case NATURAL:
5351                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5352                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5353                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5354                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5355
5356                            float vecX = xi - x + vec.x;

5358                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5359
5360                            float newDistance = (Math.abs(vecX) + Math.abs(vecY) + Math.abs(vecZ)) + (vecX * vecX + vecY * vecY + vecZ * vecZ);
5361

5363                                distance = newDistance;
5364                                xc = xi;

5366                                zc = zi;
5367                            }

5389    private float singleCellular2Edge(float x, float y, float z) {
5390        int xr = fastRound(x);
5391        int yr = fastRound(y);
5392        int zr = fastRound(z);
5393
5394        float distance = 999999;
5395        float distance2 = 999999;
5396
5397        switch (cellularDistanceFunction) {
5398            case EUCLIDEAN:
5399                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5400                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5401                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5402                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5403
5404                            float vecX = xi - x + vec.x;
5405                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5406                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5407
5408                            float newDistance = vecX * vecX + vecY * vecY + vecZ * vecZ;
5409
5410                            distance2 = Math.max(Math.min(distance2, newDistance), distance);
5411                            distance = Math.min(distance, newDistance);
5412                        }
5413                    }
5414                }
5415                break;
5416            case MANHATTAN:
5417                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5418                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5419                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5420                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5421
5422                            float vecX = xi - x + vec.x;
5423                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5424                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5425
5426                            float newDistance = Math.abs(vecX) + Math.abs(vecY) + Math.abs(vecZ);
5427
5428                            distance2 = Math.max(Math.min(distance2, newDistance), distance);
5429                            distance = Math.min(distance, newDistance);
5430                        }
5431                    }
5432                }
5433                break;
5434            case NATURAL:
5435                for (int xi = xr - 1; xi <= xr + 1; xi++) {
5436                    for (int yi = yr - 1; yi <= yr + 1; yi++) {
5437                        for (int zi = zr - 1; zi <= zr + 1; zi++) {
5438                            Float3 vec = CELL_3D[hash256(xi, yi, zi, seed)];
5439
5440                            float vecX = xi - x + vec.x;
5441                            float vecY = yi - y + vec.y;
5442                            float vecZ = zi - z + vec.z;
5443
5444                            float newDistance = (Math.abs(vecX) + Math.abs(vecY) + Math.abs(vecZ)) + (vecX * vecX + vecY * vecY + vecZ * vecZ);
5445
5446                            distance2 = Math.max(Math.min(distance2, newDistance), distance);
5447                            distance = Math.min(distance, newDistance);
5448                        }
5449                    }
5450                }
5451                break;
5452            default:
5453                break;
5454        }
5455
5456        switch (cellularReturnType) {
5457            case DISTANCE_2:
5458                return distance2 - 1;
5459            case DISTANCE_2_ADD:
5460                return distance2 + distance - 1;
5461            case DISTANCE_2_SUB:
5462                return distance2 - distance - 1;
5463            case DISTANCE_2_MUL:
5464                return distance2 * distance - 1;
5465            case DISTANCE_2_DIV:

5467            default:

5656    private void singleGradientPerturb3(int seed, float perturbAmp, float frequency, float[] v3) {
5657        float xf = v3[0] * frequency;
5658        float yf = v3[1] * frequency;
5659        float zf = v3[2] * frequency;
5660
5661        int x0 = fastFloor(xf);
5662        int y0 = fastFloor(yf);
5663        int z0 = fastFloor(zf);
5664        int x1 = x0 + 1;
5665        int y1 = y0 + 1;
5666        int z1 = z0 + 1;
5667
5668        float xs, ys, zs;
5669        switch (interpolation) {
5670            default:
5671            case LINEAR:
5672                xs = xf - x0;
5673                ys = yf - y0;
5674                zs = zf - z0;
5675                break;
5676            case HERMITE:
5677                xs = hermiteInterpolator(xf - x0);
5678                ys = hermiteInterpolator(yf - y0);
5679                zs = hermiteInterpolator(zf - z0);
5680                break;
5681            case QUINTIC:
5682                xs = quinticInterpolator(xf - x0);
5683                ys = quinticInterpolator(yf - y0);
5684                zs = quinticInterpolator(zf - z0);
5685                break;
5686        }
5687
5688        Float3 vec0 = CELL_3D[hash256(x0, y0, z0, seed)];
5689        Float3 vec1 = CELL_3D[hash256(x1, y0, z0, seed)];
5690
5691        float lx0x = lerp(vec0.x, vec1.x, xs);
5692        float ly0x = lerp(vec0.y, vec1.y, xs);
5693        float lz0x = lerp(vec0.z, vec1.z, xs);
5694
5695        vec0 = CELL_3D[hash256(x0, y1, z0, seed)];
5696        vec1 = CELL_3D[hash256(x1, y1, z0, seed)];
5697
5698        float lx1x = lerp(vec0.x, vec1.x, xs);
5699        float ly1x = lerp(vec0.y, vec1.y, xs);
5700        float lz1x = lerp(vec0.z, vec1.z, xs);
5701
5702        float lx0y = lerp(lx0x, lx1x, ys);
5703        float ly0y = lerp(ly0x, ly1x, ys);
5704        float lz0y = lerp(lz0x, lz1x, ys);
5705
5706        vec0 = CELL_3D[hash256(x0, y0, z1, seed)];
5707        vec1 = CELL_3D[hash256(x1, y0, z1, seed)];
5708
5709        lx0x = lerp(vec0.x, vec1.x, xs);
5710        ly0x = lerp(vec0.y, vec1.y, xs);
5711        lz0x = lerp(vec0.z, vec1.z, xs);
5712
5713        vec0 = CELL_3D[hash256(x0, y1, z1, seed)];
5714        vec1 = CELL_3D[hash256(x1, y1, z1, seed)];
5715
5716        lx1x = lerp(vec0.x, vec1.x, xs);
5717        ly1x = lerp(vec0.y, vec1.y, xs);
5718        lz1x = lerp(vec0.z, vec1.z, xs);
5719
5720        v3[0] += lerp(lx0y, lerp(lx0x, lx1x, ys), zs) * perturbAmp;
5721        v3[1] += lerp(ly0y, lerp(ly0x, ly1x, ys), zs) * perturbAmp;
5722        v3[2] += lerp(lz0y, lerp(lz0x, lz1x, ys), zs) * perturbAmp;
5723    }

5790    public float singleHoney(int seed, float x, float y) {
5791        final float result = (singleSimplex(seed, x, y) + singleValue(seed ^ 0x9E3779B9, x, y)) * 0.5f + 1f;
5792        return (result <= 1f) ? result * result - 1f : (result - 2f) * -(result - 2f) + 1f;
5793
5794        //return singleSimplex(seed, x, y, 0.5f * singleSimplex(seed * 0xDAB ^ 0x9E3779BD, x, y));
5795//        return singleSimplex(seed, x, y + 0.25f * singleSimplex(seed * 0xDAB ^ 0x9E3779BD, y, x));
5796//        return singleSimplex(seed, x + NumberTools.swayRandomized(seed, y) * 0.25f, y + NumberTools.swayRandomized(seed, x) * 0.25f);
5797        
5798//        final float a = singleSimplex(seed, x, y);
5799//        seed += 0x9E3779BD;
5800//        seed ^= seed >>> 14;
5801//        final float b = singleSimplex(seed, x + a * 0.25f, y);
5802//        return NumberTools.sin_((a + b) * 0.25f); 
5803    }
5804
5805    public float getHoneyFractal(float x, float y) {
5806        x *= frequency;
5807        y *= frequency;
5808
5809        switch (fractalType) {
5810            case FBM:
5811                return singleHoneyFractalFBM(x, y);
5812            case BILLOW:
5813                return singleHoneyFractalBillow(x, y);
5814            case RIDGED_MULTI:
5815                return singleHoneyFractalRidgedMulti(x, y);
5816            default:
5817                return 0;
5818        }
5819    }
5820
5821    private float singleHoneyFractalFBM(float x, float y) {
5822        int seed = this.seed;
5823        float sum = singleHoney(seed, x, y);
5824        float amp = 1, t;
5825
5826        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
5827            t = x;
5828            x = y * lacunarity;
5829            y = t * lacunarity;
5830
5831            amp *= gain;
5832            sum += singleHoney(seed + i, x, y) * amp;
5833        }
5834
5835        return sum * fractalBounding;
5836    }
5837
5838    private float singleHoneyFractalBillow(float x, float y) {
5839        int seed = this.seed;
5840        float sum = Math.abs(singleHoney(seed, x, y)) * 2 - 1;
5841        float amp = 1, t;
5842
5843        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
5844            t = x;
5845            x = y * lacunarity;
5846            y = t * lacunarity;
5847
5848            amp *= gain;
5849            sum += (Math.abs(singleHoney(++seed, x, y)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
5850        }
5851
5852        return sum * fractalBounding;
5853    }
5854
5855    private float singleHoneyFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y) {
5856        int seed = this.seed;
5857        float t;
5858        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
5859        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
5860            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleHoney(seed + i, x, y));
5861            correction += (exp *= 0.5);
5862            sum += spike * exp;
5863            t = x;
5864            x = y * lacunarity;
5865            y = t * lacunarity;
5866        }
5867        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
5868    }
5869
5870    public float getHoneyFractal(float x, float y, float z) {
5871        x *= frequency;
5872        y *= frequency;
5873        z *= frequency;
5874
5875        switch (fractalType) {
5876            case FBM:
5877                return singleHoneyFractalFBM(x, y, z);
5878            case BILLOW:
5879                return singleHoneyFractalBillow(x, y, z);
5880            case RIDGED_MULTI:
5881                return singleHoneyFractalRidgedMulti(x, y, z);
5882            default:
5883                return 0;
5884        }
5885    }

5887    private float singleHoneyFractalFBM(float x, float y, float z) {
5888        int seed = this.seed;
5889        float sum = singleHoney(seed, x, y, z);
5890        float amp = 1;
5891
5892        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
5893            x *= lacunarity;
5894            y *= lacunarity;
5895            z *= lacunarity;
5896
5897            amp *= gain;
5898            sum += singleHoney(++seed, x, y, z) * amp;
5899        }
5900
5901        return sum * fractalBounding;
5902    }

5904    private float singleHoneyFractalBillow(float x, float y, float z) {
5905        int seed = this.seed;
5906        float sum = Math.abs(singleHoney(seed, x, y, z)) * 2 - 1;
5907        float amp = 1;
5908
5909        for (int i = 1; i < octaves; i++) {
5910            x *= lacunarity;
5911            y *= lacunarity;
5912            z *= lacunarity;
5913
5914            amp *= gain;
5915            sum += (Math.abs(singleHoney(++seed, x, y, z)) * 2 - 1) * amp;
5916        }
5917
5918        return sum * fractalBounding;
5919    }

5921    private float singleHoneyFractalRidgedMulti(float x, float y, float z) {
5922        int seed = this.seed;
5923        float sum = 0f, exp = 2f, correction = 0f, spike;
5924        for (int i = 0; i < octaves; i++) {
5925            spike = 1f - Math.abs(singleHoney(seed + i, x, y, z));
5926            correction += (exp *= 0.5);
5927            sum += spike * exp;
5928            x *= lacunarity;
5929            y *= lacunarity;
5930            z *= lacunarity;
5931        }
5932        return sum * 2f / correction - 1f;
5933    }

6640     * This gradient vector array was quasi-randomly generated after a lot of rejection sampling. Each gradient should
6641     * have a magnitude of 2.0, matching the magnitude of the center of an edge of a 5D hypercube.
6642     * This may bias slightly in some directions. The sums of the x, y, z, w, and u components of all 256 vectors are:
6643     * <br>
6644     * x: +0.52959638973427, y: +0.31401370534460, z: -0.14792091580658, w: -0.00781214643439, u: -0.58206620017072
6645     * <br>
6646     * Most of the rejected sets of 256 vectors had some component sums at 10 or more, so having all of these close to
6647     * 0.0 is good. The specific technique used here was to redistribute the x, y, z, w, and u components of 5D points
6648     * from the R5 sequence, putting them on a Gaussian distribution using {@link MathExtras#probit(double)} and then
6649     * normalizing the resulting 5D vector. Because the R5 sequence is quasi-random (it only very rarely returns clumps
6650     * of points that are close-together in both the sequence and in space), the Gaussian points were more likely to be
6651     * quasi-random as well, and far fewer point sets needed to be rejected.
6652     */
